text: The concert was generally well organized with a few glitches. However we found the three hours duration too long and the genres between the younger students and older ones too vastly different.

Seimpi is a very curriculum/syllabus/programs structured music school. It is definitely a good enrichment school to nurture young ones as the school put in place routemap trackers and performers to audience kind of interacting experiences which I would say not a lot of music schools out there would provide for young individuals. Besides this, the school has very sound and foundational rapport and collaborations with renowned music institution around the globe like The Birmingham Music Conservatory and many others! With all the above mentioned aspects, the school definitely can nurtured young musicians holistically to face off with the evolving musical industry in years to come!

My child has been with Seimpi since 2 years old and she is now 9 years old. The school has great music initiatives and programs that are beneficial for young and older kids. Great learning programs and experiences!
